question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of popcorn has 300 calories per serving. If a 225 ounces bag has 5 servings, how many ouncess can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2175 and you have already consumed 1275 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2175 and I have consumed 1275 calories then I have 2175-1275 = <<2175-1275=900>>900 calories left to eat
If each serving of popcorn has 300 calories and I only have 900 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 900/300 of a serving = 3 of a serving
We also know that a 225 ounces bag of popcorn has 5 servings, hence each serving has 225 ounces/5 = <<225/5=45>>45 ouncess
If I can only eat 3 of a serving, then I can eat only 45 ounces * 3 = 135 ouncess
#### 135
